title: Vintage decorative seems like i've seen it before
content:
Please me out and let me know what this typeface is? I know I've seen it before but what is it? I would like the one that says post card and also the one that says rsvp.

thanks in advance!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020220924im_/http:/typophile.com/files/TypefaceExample_6542.jpg)
author: shielddesign

comments.content: Regardless of size, the POST CARD cut shows up as all of one piece in type specimen books. For instance, the 1913 ATF catalog has six separate cuts called "Post Card Embellishments," all presumably handlettered.
